line_1: Did the sharp pang we feel for friends deceas'd
line_2: But nature bids its rigour should be eas'd

line_1: My self attend on the Deceas'd,
line_2: When all their Earthly Train's releas'd;
Your rents improv'd, your lands increas'd,
The popish dubbing of a priest,

line_1: Yet still he accuses his Parents deceas'd,
line_2: For making a Man of such Spirit a Priest.
